fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Authorize an investigation on an additional player during the day. Mandatory or random.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you attempt to authorize an investigation on a player already authorized, that player will instead be **prioritized**.
- **Prioritized** targets will have:
- Their base/vest defense removed until they are no longer prioritized.
- Visitors be given frame & roleblock immunity
- Your Authorized & prioritized targets will be revealed each night.
- Targets will remain authorized/prioritized until the end of the following day.
- If you attempt to authorize a Sentry (Power), it will automatically fail.
- Conversion Immunity
